Lesson.title: Text Rewriting Station
Lesson.TextBlock:
## Write a text
Put it in the box provided. After you get feedback and look at examples, feel free to revise your answer.

ActionButton.label: First Grader Text
ActionButton.LLMAction: Please rewrite this in simple English for a first grader: student_essay

ActionButton.label: Academic SSR
ActionButton.LLMAction: Please rewrite this in contorted social sciences academic English: student_essay

ActionButton.label: Business
ActionButton.LLMAction: Please rewrite this in business English, with a marketing focus: student_essay

ActionButton.label: First person
ActionButton.LLMAction: Please rewrite this in first person: student_essay

ActionButton.label: Comedian
ActionButton.LLMAction: You're a world-class comedian. Please rewrite this to be hilarious, and with an edge. You can make stuff up (hey, it's comedy), but there should be real jokes (not just flippancy): student_essay

ActionButton.label: Chinese American
ActionButton.LLMAction: Please rewrite this using a Chinese communication style, organization, and argumentation structure (e.g. as described by Hofstede or Meyer), but in English:

ActionButton.label: Lawyer
ActionButton.LLMAction: Please rewrite this text in legal English for a legal filing: student_essay

ActionButton.label: Middle Schooler
ActionButton.LLMAction: Please rewrite this text as a lower-to-mid-level middle schooler. Please include middle-school level spelling errors, grammar errors, and style issues; we'll want middle-school students to find and correct issues: student_essay
